rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural lighting and sustainable materials.
Large open area with eco-friendly furniture and smart climate control.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring energy-efficient LED lights and minimalistic design.
State-of-the-art kitchen with energy-saving appliances and natural ventilation.
An open courtyard designed for natural light and air circulation, enhancing the eco-friendly design.
Spacious room with sustainable materials and energy-efficient windows.
Cozy bedroom designed for relaxation and privacy.
Functional room for visitors, integrating Vastu principles with north-east orientation.
Compact living space for the domestic help, located away from the main living areas but easily accessible.
A small but functional toilet area designed with eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.description: Energy-efficient windows for optimal natural ventilation and lighting.
Sustainable wood door with energy-saving locks.
Access to the central courtyard and terrace for fresh air.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring ample living space in line with G+2 design.
Private balcony area for relaxation, integrating greenery and sustainable design elements.
A luxury rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, solar panel installations and an eco-friendly garden space.

openings.description: Energy-efficient staircase integrated with safety features.
